Miscellaneous Highlights: The 23rd annual Roberto Clemente Day was celebrated at PNC Park before the Pirates' series finale against the Kansas City Royals.
Roberto Clemente's sons threw out ceremonial first pitches, and his grandsons signified the start of play.
All Pirates players and coaches wore jerseys featuring No. 21 in tribute to Roberto Clemente.
The No. 21 was cut into the grass in right field in front of the Clemente Wall.
David Bednar, the Pirates' nominee for the Roberto Clemente Award, was recognized during an on-field ceremony.
